patthana1.18:1.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—uppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:1.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:2.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—uppannaṁ cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā …pe…
patthana1.18:2.1_3: Uppannaṁ sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.18:2.1_6: uppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe…
patthana1.18:2.1_8: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.18:2.1_10: uppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:3.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—anuppanne rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.18:3.1_2: anuppanne khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati …pe…
patthana1.18:3.1_4: Anuppannā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:4.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—uppādiṁ cakkhuṁ …pe… kāyaṁ … rūpe … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.18:4.1_5: Uppādī khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:5.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.18:5.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—uppannaṁ cakkhuṁ garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.18:5.1_2: Uppannaṁ sotaṁ … ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase …
patthana1.18:5.1_5: uppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati …pe….
patthana1.18:5.1_6: **Sahajātādhipati**—uppannā adhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:6.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:6.1_3: anuppanne khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.18:7.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:7.1_5: uppādī khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.18:8.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:8.1_1: dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:8.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:8.1_3: dve khandhā dvinnaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:8.1_6: Ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:8.1_8: mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:9.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa aññamaññapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:9.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ vatthussa ca aññamaññapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:9.1_10: asaññasattānaṁ ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ aññamaññapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:10.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa nissayapaccayena paccayo—uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ nissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:10.1_10: mahābhūtā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kaṭattārūpānaṁ upādārūpānaṁ cakkhāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.18:11.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.18:11.1_4: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.18:11.1_9: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.18:11.1_13: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:12.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.18:12.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—anuppannaṁ vaṇṇasampadaṁ patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.18:12.1_6: anuppanne khandhe patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.18:12.1_9: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:13.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.18:13.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—uppādiṁ cakkhusampadaṁ patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.18:13.1_8: uppādī khandhe patthayamāno dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ karoti.
patthana1.18:13.1_14: paññāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:14.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.18:14.1_2: vatthuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.18:14.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.18:15.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:16.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:16.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:17.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:17.1_2: paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.18:18.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—uppannā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:19.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo—uppannā indriyā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ indriyapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:20.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa jhānapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.18:20.1_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe uppannā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:20.1_6: Khandhā vatthussa, vatthu khandhānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:20.1_10: **Pacchājātā**—uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:21.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.18:21.1_1: **Sahajāto**—uppanno eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.18:21.1_11: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.18:21.1_16: **Pacchājātā**—uppannā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:22.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa avigatapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.18:23.1_0: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.18:25.1_0: Uppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.18:26.1_0: Anuppanno dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:27.1_0: Uppādī dhammo uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.18:28.1_0: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
patthana1.18:28.1_1: navippayutte tīṇi, noatthiyā dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi, noavigate dve.
patthana1.18:30.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… nonatthiyā novigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.18:32.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, sahajāte ekaṁ, aññamaññe ekaṁ, nissaye ekaṁ, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā avigate ekaṁ.
